author: jvanzyl
msg: o Applying patch provided by John Thorhauer:
I have a patch for betwixt.  The problem that I am having is with the
DefaultPluralStemmer.  It does not deal real well with plurals that end
in 'es'.  I have included a patch for both the test case and the patch
for the DefaultPluralStemmer.  If you run the test without applying the
fix you will see the problem.

author: jstrachan
msg: Minor patch to prevent index out of bound exceptions for empty strings

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch unit test case so that it works inside Maven, which can sometimes use other logging frameworks.
So now the test case explicitly sets the Logger implementation to use in the testValidEndOfLine() test case

author: jstrachan
msg: regenerated the Ant build.xml file from CVS HEAD of Maven as per Sam Ruby's patch.
